cards.rules_text:
Flying
Persist [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]
When Bitter Corvus enters, you may reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is Bitter Corvus' power. You may put up to one card revealed this way into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. Put the rest into your graveyard.

Flash
Flying
When Justiciar Overseer enters, the next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each differently named land you control.
Reach, trample
When Pious Flutist enters, create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Take an extra turn after this one. If this spell was cast from exile, take two extra turns after this one instead. Shuffle Reflected Moment into its owner's main library.
Prophecy {6}{U}{U} [i](Once each turn, you may exile a card with prophecy as you reveal it. When you do, you may cast it for its prophecy cost as long as it's exiled.)[/i]

This spell can't be countered.
Polis's Demise deals 5 damage to each creature. Destroy all artifacts.

Choose two or four —
• Each opponent sacrifices an artifact.
• Create a 1/1 red Warrior creature token.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.
• Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Flying
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, choose one —
• Exile target creature with power less than that creature's power.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.
• That creature gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn. Untap it.

Flying, ward {2}
Whenever Realm Crossers deals combat damage to a player, create a blue enchantment token named Tambo with “At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control a Scout.”

Whenever Neon Claw Knight enters or attacks, choose one. Create a Function token with that effect. [i](It's an enchantment. As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, sacrifice any number of Functions to add their effects to that spell.)[/i]
• This spell can't be countered.
• This spell costs {R} less to cast.
• If this spell would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
Whenever a creature you control dies, destroy target creature you don't control.
